website_summaries.verdict: Durable stainless steel dog ID tag that allows for engraving on both the front and back.
pros: Engraving method ensures the tag will be easily readable well into the future
The stainless steel material in this dog tag is a bit thicker than aluminum style tags
Available in multiple shapes and sizes, so you can match it to your pet's size
cons: Allows for 3 lines of engraved text per side, which is less than some others

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and real engraving, not laser
customer_reviews.text: Was pleased to find real engraved tags. We had laser engraved tags which lasted about a year before the wording began to rub off and became difficult to read. I have high hopes that these will last forever. The lettering was appropriately sized for the number of characters per line and nicely centered.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to Travel

customer_reviews.title: These are the ones!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 of these for our kitties just in case they ever get out. It was so easy to choose the size and shape, and to add the line dog text. The preview feature was nice bc I wanted everything to be legible and was able to make adjustments I tiki got it right. They shipped very quickly and as soon as I opened the envelope I actually ran around showing everyone how beautiful they are! The names are beautifully large and centered on the front, and the 2 lines on the back are easy to read and nicely aligned. Couldn't recommend them more - amazing! Thanks so much for functional yet beautiful pet tags!
customer_reviews.author: Daphne_Blue

customer_reviews.title: Great service. Good tag.
customer_reviews.text: Seller was VERY responsive and emailed right away. Other reviews let me know the depth of the engraving wouldn't be super deep, so, that was very helpful in setting my expectations up front. The tag is good, has the necessary info and it's not going to rub off like the aluminum ones from PetSmart or the grocery store did.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn F. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: On a pet ID tag, the main requirement is for the lettering to be deep enough that it wont wear off through regular use. You can feel the indentation of the letters on this tag. The lettering also looks good. I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Lorb

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have bought from this company! Love them! Great price, and great sized for small dogs :)
customer_reviews.author: Joanne K

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are not the "DEEP" engraved tags (from the same manufacturer) that I previously purchased for my other dog... and which for some odd unstated reason were unavailable when I purchased these, and are now available again two weeks later... but these are still very nice tags. They still deserve 5 stars. The price is very reasonable, and they look like they will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: B.W.

customer_reviews.title: Quick Service, Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Tag is nice weight, sturdy but not heavy. Information on tag is "etched" rather than "carved". Makes information more readable and (I think) more attractive. Thank you for quick service! I adopted a 4.5 pound Chihuahua who likes to roam. Steadily discovering and blocking her escape routes, but feel better that she has ID on at all times.
customer_reviews.author: piperabigail

customer_reviews.title: Yuri loves his tag!  And so does Opie!
customer_reviews.text: Great tag, it arrived fast. We got the largest size, knowing he'll grow in to it. As you can see from the picture, his name is easy to read. Thanks for the quick turnaround time! 5 months after the purchase: We got the first tag in May, then got a 2nd dog in October. We had such a good experience with the first order, we decided to reordered the same tag for the 2nd dog. Again, we got very fast service. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Tag is very nice. I had my dogs chip # put on ...
customer_reviews.text: Tag is very nice. I had my dogs chip # put on one side and her county tag info on the other. SHE LOVES to go kayaking and so she is in the water almost every weekend. So far it's held up to the brackish water without discoloration or rusting. She's had it over a month. I had a problem where the first one was lost in the mail. They made me a second of no charge and sent it immediately. Very good company to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tags
customer_reviews.text: The tags I received are exactly as described: stainless tag with deep engraving. The engraving is accurate, precisely what I requested. The online site where one enters the engraving info was a bit daunting because when you hit "done" there is no returning web page verifying your input. But as I noted, I received what I was requested. One other note...as others have mentioned the split rings provided are too small and become distorted after threading them onto a larger d-ring found on many dog collars, so be prepared to use alternative hardware.
customer_reviews.author: GreenLantern

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Tags from the microchip company became illegible in short order. These cost less than their version in steel. Love that they are engraved so I don't have to worry about them becoming illegible. The double-sided engraving is an added bonus...like getting two tags for the price of one. Eventually ordered one for each dog and one for the cat. Very happy! Came faster than the estimated date. Great experience with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: julie morita

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful tag! Excellent quality, sturdy and looks beautiful! I’m so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ragdollyanna

customer_reviews.title: I considered another less expensive one with good reviews but discovered that the letters were not engraved ...
customer_reviews.text: This tag was just what we were looking for. I considered another less expensive one with good reviews but discovered that the letters were not engraved and eventually could wear off. The customer service was very accommodating and offered me an actual heart engraving rather than the makeshift "<3" I wrote from the keyboard. Overall great experience!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: They are so easy to read! I will never go back to the other ones. Also I was able to include health info on the reverse side. Love them. Love them. LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: achance

customer_reviews.title: Great Tags
customer_reviews.text: These are amazingly awesome. I was going to buy my new dog tags from Meijer but I am so glad I found these on amazon. They are great priced and they are great looking. I thought they were going to come out small to where you can't read them but they came out really good. I'm so glad I purchased them and I would recommend them for anyone. I love how you can engrave both sides. On the front I put my dogs name and my phone number and on the back I put my address. So great I will keep coming back for more. Don't hesitate. There great looking and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Darion

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected! Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have made two purchases of these and they came exactly as described looking better than expected. And they arrived sooner than Amazon had indicated both times. The price? Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: CrittTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Nicely done. Not really for cats though.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Good ship time. Unfortunately I can't use what I ordered though. The xs would only work for a large cat. It is much too big/heavy for a normal to petite sized cat. It's actually too big for my toy poodle as well, but she is ridiculously small lol. So normal dogs - this would work great. Cats and tiny dogs - no.
customer_reviews.author: Jill T.

customer_reviews.title: I think they're super cute. The engraving was EXACTLY like I entered
customer_reviews.text: Really gorgeous tags, I've always wanted star shaped tags for my dog, I think they're super cute. The engraving was EXACTLY like I entered, with capitalization and punctuation included as I entered it. The only issue I had was the split ring was VERY stiff and hard to get on to the collar, but I know that it will stay once you get it there!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Tag
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that I ordered the wrong tag size! I meant to order the 1", but I accidentally ordered the 1 1/2", and it is HUGE! Other than my blunder, I love it! I really like that it's engraved. It's feel super sturdy. Would buy again, but in the right size. :)
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not flimsy at all, and real engraving that you can feel. This should last several years, unlike the more cheaply made “laser engraved” tags for only a little less money. Quick same day shipping as well.
customer_reviews.author: PeteNY

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Cheap price cheap product. Engraving wore out quickly and metal bent up. But it was a better reminder to get a replacement than it was to not have anything at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ling

customer_reviews.title: Best tags ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to read, sturdy and will last a long time. I appreciate that this is a small family owned business based in the USA. I ordered these as replacements for tags I purchased from another company in April 2017 that were already wearing out. I will order from this company again!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, came quicker than expected. Font is legible and since it is laser engraved, it won't wear off anytime soon. Worth the extra couple dollars when compared to the cheaper printed ones.
customer_reviews.author: Luke M.

customer_reviews.title: 💕 love th pet tags
customer_reviews.text: 💕 love th pet tags. They are actually engraved and they are well made. I ordered one for my lab a few month ago and he is an out side dog and his tag is still readable and looks nice. we loved it so much we ordered one for our doxel. Although the tag is bigger than she is.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen posey

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described, Shipped Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I got the XL bone (probably should've gotten the regular size) and it shipped quickly. The engraving is etched so it will take awhile for it to wear off as opposed to other tags. Happy with the product so far and hope with the locking caribeaner I bought, my dog won't lose this one :)
customer_reviews.author: S in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Engraved - not printed....these are high quality tags at a reasonable price. I previously purchased a so-called "engraved" tag on Amazon that was merely printed on and wore off before a year had passed. This tag will last for my dogs lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Raftman

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs and four paws up!
customer_reviews.text: We had bought an id tag at Petsmart - the kind you laser print in a little machine right there. It heavy (too heavy) and the lettering wore down fairly quickly as a result of jangling against other tags. This one is legitimately etched. Dog's name and phone number on one side, address and phone number on the other - very legible, lightweight and looks durable. Half the price of the Petsmart version and arrived very quickly. Two thumbs and four paws up!
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Dog Tags.
customer_reviews.text: Stainless is definitely the way to go. Printing may be a bit difficult to ready, however, these tags are much more durable than aluminum ones I had purchased previously. Also, the tags have a much more pleasing sound when clang against other tags on the dogs' collars.
customer_reviews.author: JJG

customer_reviews.title: They were accurately engraved and the engraving feels pretty deep. Time will tell how they hold up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered multiple tags for my multiple Rescue dogs. These tags came fairly quickly even though they were not Amazon Prime. They were accurately engraved and the engraving feels pretty deep. Time will tell how they hold up, but they seem like a quality product! I would recommend. The price was right!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great resource for pet ID tags
customer_reviews.text: I liked that I could customize the pet tag with several lines for information on front and back of tag. The process was easy, the shipping was fast, the reasonable price and the info was easy to read! It came with the small ring for attaching to the collar.
customer_reviews.author: K. L.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tag for pets collar! The engraving is very clear and easy to read. I really like that it is not done with any black ink which always wears off. Will definitely order from his seller in the future.
customer_reviews.author: AMY

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and are perfect attractive ID tags for my rat terriers. 💙💙💙
customer_reviews.author: J. Green

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT pet tag for my Percy!
customer_reviews.text: My tag came in time, it is very beautiful. The tag feels very sturdy and nice, the ring holder is well made (unlike some of them out there that are very flimsy). The engraving looks great and it IS actual engraving, not printed On like some other tag sellers do. I am very happy with this name tag and will definitively buy more for my pup in the future from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Baotri Ho

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't show much wear and tear
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Package came quickly and the customization was exactly what I wanted. This product is perfect for my dog who likes to chew on her tags...she's had it on for months and it looks as good as it did when we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Engraving could be better
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected. The metal is not very thick. My only real complaint is that the engraving is not that deep (probably due to thin metal), which makes it hard to read unless you turn it a certain angle. But it was a good price and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: n.hamm

customer_reviews.title: Guten Tag! (pun intended)!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the dog had to be returned, but I loved the tag. I'm about to get another dog, so guess what tag I will order! I loved the laser look and the clarity of the printing. Even the apology (if it arrived late because of Irma) was a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Morton

customer_reviews.title: As described. I intentionally purchased this because it is ...
customer_reviews.text: As described. I intentionally purchased this because it is heavier duty than one I purchased a year ago. I think this one will last longer. The first one I bought from another company was lighter, and the engraving was rubbed away from my dog's rabies tag, making it unreadable.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It's really engraved in the tag and not just written on there. Lightweight. Overall seems like it's made from a good material, durable, very legible. You will find cheaper dog tags on amazon but those are just printed on and not engraved into the tag like these ones are. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Already getting hard to read, could not tell the engraving was deeper than others we had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dog tag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dog tag!! There was even a mistake which happened & I texted them to notify them of the problem. After that I received a reply almost immediately. They offered to correct the problem free of charge which we did immediately
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Nice tags, arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Nice tags, arrived quickly. They are engraved, not stamped, so you sometimes have to adjust the angle to see the writing. I expect this writing will last much longer than the "laser" ones I got at the big pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my new puppy. It's not the thinnest or most appealing. Everything was spelled and labeled correctly but I would have like a thicker more dense material to be used. Decent value.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted, and a nice piece of puppy jewelry!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Flemr

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Tag
customer_reviews.text: Uncanny how suppliers want satisfaction surveys about 12 hours after delivery! Looks great, and should hold up, but TOO soon to tell, I guess...... Looks professionally made and should live up to hype. Nice tag.
customer_reviews.author: jimbmw

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy metal, not flimsy. Engraving slightly faint; just wish engraving were a bit bolder, thicker lines forming the letters so that legibility would be stronger, and not at all faint. Still I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Diana E Deyton

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price --- could use a stronger key ring
customer_reviews.text: Love the tag... exactly what I ordered. But i wish the key ring were a little bit stronger. My dog plays HARD with other dogs at daycare... and they've already loosened his key ring --- needed to use a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Richeys

customer_reviews.title: Looks great - just as described
customer_reviews.text: Looks great - just as described. Gave 4 instead of 5 stars because it scratches very easily. I scratched it just in trying to attach it to the ring.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi L. Hines

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: I love my dog tag. It did take a little longer to get it but it wa exactly what I expected. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Rae

customer_reviews.title: Letters do not last. Faded off after a few months
customer_reviews.text: The tag itself is a good quality, but the etched letters don’t last very long. It appears that it was painted on and rubs off after a four months. I can barely see my pets information on it any more. I’ve contacted the company about it and it’s been six days; no response yet. I’ll wait and see if they will do anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: cmerchant8

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Larger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Larger than I expected, but it makes for a larger font that's easier to read. I like that you can engrave front and back of tag allowing 2 phone numbers. This is replacing a tag from a competitor that the writing wore off in 1 year. Hope it lasts longer, so far the quality seems much better.
customer_reviews.author: JBC

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very good!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality! I was shopping around and couldn't find a price that beats this one. I highly recommend getting a dog tag here. Make sure it's from Pawsitively Pet Tags!!
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Fast and good
customer_reviews.text: Laser engraving was perfect. I wish the engraving was a little deeper but this is an excellent product for the price. Also received the product very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: GRM

customer_reviews.title: tags were EXACTLY as ordered and better than expected
customer_reviews.text: tags were EXACTLY as ordered and better than expected. I am thinking about ordering a second set of the same tags so I don't have to switch them back & forth on my dogs' "beach collars" and "house collars". I ordered the start shape and they are perfect ! Plus the price was great and I didn't have to go to the store !
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: The size was perfect. Must admit I was expecting the engraving to ...
customer_reviews.text: The size was perfect. Must admit I was expecting the engraving to be a little deeper in hopes that it will last longer. Decent tag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I've had this on my puppy for a few weeks now and so far so good. It seems to hold up well even with her trying to chew on it.
customer_reviews.author: DessertChef

customer_reviews.title: These tags look lovely in my standard poodle pup, ...
customer_reviews.text: These tags look lovely in my standard poodle pup, I got the star and the large bone. The engraving on both tags are well done. These tags will last a many ears.
customer_reviews.author: SpunkNuggetz

customer_reviews.title: Would order again for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast service. They all look great (ordered for 3 pets). They also seem to be wearing well (about 1 month). Would order again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Frame

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Love the font! Engraving is 100% perfect! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Glen W.

customer_reviews.title: I thought the script would be small but since I only put the name they enlarged it and I love it. Great Job
customer_reviews.text: The cutest tag! Made well. I thought the script would be small but since I only put the name they enlarged it and I love it. Great Job. I would recommend this tag for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: gramy

customer_reviews.title: I would order again!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my pet tag and customer service offered by Pawsitively Pet Tags! The tag was made exactly as I wanted it and arrived in a very timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: DMM

customer_reviews.title: I love the pet tag
customer_reviews.text: This time I got it right. I ordered a tag WAY too big for my lab and reordered a size large that fits the bone tag silencer so we don't hear it gingle now. I love the pet tag.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice tag
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the name tag. Good price, good product and fast shipping. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: amanda hill

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome this is the second time I bought my pet ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome this is the second time I bought my pet tags from Pawsitively Pet Tags and they have always arrived fast, well packed and without errors, the material and the engraving looks fine and durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dog tag!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the bone dog tag. Its a nice weight not flimsy is the ones you get from a machine at pet stores. I would recommend this tag
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: The best ID Tags I've found!
customer_reviews.text: ID Tags have excellent engraving; probably some of the best I've seen! The quality tag material couldn't be any better. I couldn't be happy with these tags.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Bean

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect, I wish the engraving was more noticeable
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect, I wish the engraving was more noticeable, is good but not great is almost "like a shadow" instead of a solid engraving, is ok
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Love these tags!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stainless steel tag is exactly as described. Etching is clean & accurate. Being able to scribe on both sides covers a lot of information.
customer_reviews.author: D. Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This tag looks very nice. The engraving looks like it will last a long time. The letters were a good readable size (I had two lines on one side). The order was received 1 week earlier than expected. Also, came with a ring.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Large. Very easy to read. Enough lines to include all important information. Good price. Would recommend to all concerned pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just got ours today, it’s very nice quality! Clip in photo - I purchased separate..UPDATE .still nice one month later
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the tag. It's of good quality. It holds a lot of infos...not just the pet's name. I received it fast, so I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted. What more can I say ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. What more can I say. We were warned by other users that the ring was flimsy so had already purchased a ring at the hardware store. So now we have dog and a dog tag, but what we don't have is a little boy for our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Hal E. Lemmon

customer_reviews.title: Great for more than just pets.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect, and when USPS lost one of my orders, they shipped another one out immediately, no questions asked. I use them to label my decorative lotion/soap dispensers.
customer_reviews.author: diffenbaucher

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Engraving is nicely done. Exactly what I wanted and the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tags
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tags. Got one for my dog and cat. Better than the ones you get at the retail stores for half the price with more letters.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G.

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice size and weight and all of the engraving is legible
customer_reviews.text: I got the xl star shape. It is a nice size and weight and all of the engraving is correct and easy to read. The attachment ring is a little flimsy so I used a different one I already had.
customer_reviews.author: KINGBIRDBRAIN

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet ID Tag
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! We ordered the small bone shaped tag and it is the perfect size for our teacup yorkie.
customer_reviews.author: JenMTX

customer_reviews.title: Pet ID Tags
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the tags. They shipped early, and the engraving was very nice. Look great on my 2 little yorkies.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Yup!
customer_reviews.text: Wish the wire to attach the id tag had been a bit larger/sturdier, which would have made the tags easier to attach. The tags themselves were pretty much perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Aine O'brocken

customer_reviews.title: Typeset IS Scalable!
customer_reviews.text: Typeset IS scalable! Very nice job! This means that if you use just a name and a phone number on 3 lines like I did, your phone number will be easily readable on the small tag,
customer_reviews.author: kiznkitten

customer_reviews.title: Dog tags...
customer_reviews.text: The dog tags came in a week and look great, just as I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Galarza

customer_reviews.title: Pet Tag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tag, exactly as ordered, better than going to pet store. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie w.

customer_reviews.title: Assuming it holds up for years and continues to look good, I will be totally satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Assuming it holds up for years and continues to look good, I will be totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: D Troom

customer_reviews.title: looks great and is easy to read
customer_reviews.text: The tag arrived on time, looks great and is easy to read. I would purchase this again without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki & Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for offering this. We had to put our beloved Honey down and attached this to the wind chime in her memory. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Edward A.

customer_reviews.title: Great tag
customer_reviews.text: Great tags I ordered the XL just right for my English Bull dog. Received them in 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H. Henning

customer_reviews.title: It arrived quickly and seems like it's pretty durable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute tag! It arrived quickly and seems like it's pretty durable. The name is etched on so there's no worry about it rubbing off. The only thing that could be improved is the little ring attachment that comes with it. It's so tiny that it's hard to attach to the dog's collar. If it were a little bigger it would be easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, it was definitely worth the price and safety ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, it was definitely worth the price and safety of my dog, she ran away a month ago and was lost for a week and hopefully now that we have chipped and have updated her tags we won't have that problem again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Christenson

customer_reviews.title: Great price and tag
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tag on my pup for a few weeks now and it still looks great. I will definitely order from this company again if I get another dog!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: A+++++++  Quality and Service!
customer_reviews.text: Great service along with quality! I would strongly recommend to anyone looking for a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Vance

customer_reviews.title: Engraving could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Engraving is very light, I thought it would be more prominent and defined. I don't anticipate it will last long. Also wish the company offered a silicone wrap for edges to make it a quieter tag. Love the size of the XL bone.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tag is very nice. The tag was well packaged, arrived on time, and looks nice on the harness.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: MY DOG AND I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Was exactly as pictured. Am quite pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: bj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice finish, kinda looked like millions of dots to make the engraving stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Not Engraved
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars however I was looking for an actual engraved tag and not laser etched.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Z

customer_reviews.title: They seem to be good quality, but only time will tell if they ...
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be good quality, but only time will tell if they will never fade as advertised. I can say that the shipping was fast, and I like the way the tags look.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Dog tag.
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with my purchase and the price. I will purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: John  Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Very good hardware and feels durable. Very legible printing with lots of room front and back.
customer_reviews.author: Blessedmom777

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Clearly printed font. Delivered before estimated delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: Bevi

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the XL Bone shape. It's thick and seems like it will last a very long time. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Violet Dominguez

product_meta.title: Pawsitively Pet Tags Custom Stainless Steel Pet ID Tags Front and Back Engraved Dog Tags Personalized for Dogs and Cats
product_meta.description:
Pattern Name:Bone 1"x1-1/2"Premium stainless steel pet tags, custom Laser Engraved with your personalized text for dogs and cats.


 * High Quality Laser Engraving
 * Long-Lasting Stainless Steel Tags
 * Heavy Gauge Split Ring Included
 * Made in the USA by Pawsitively Pet Tags


Laser Engraving Method:
Your custom text is Laser engraved using a U.S.A. made High Powered Laser. No toxic chemicals, ink, chrome plating or coloring is used on our pet id tags for the safety of your pet. Laser Engraved pet ID tags for dogs and cats on Stainless Steel will give you a long lasting durable pet tag. 

Custom Text:
Choose only front or 2-Side engraving options, and add all of your pets important contact details. Please don't overcrowd the tag, this will ensure the information on your tags can be easily read, allowing your pet to return home safely if lost. With ID tag shapes in: Bone, Round, Heart, Star, Rectangle, Dog tag. Extra large (XL) and extra small (XS) sizes available.
feature_bullets: Laser Engraved Stainless Steel Pet ID Tags
Customization Available for Front and Back Engraving
Made in the USA by Pawsitively Pet Tags
